overview: Philip Slavin has over 25 years experience in healthcare management. Prior to joining Adjudica Phil served as Vice President, Operations of ForeSee Health, the chronic disease management division of Mercy Health Plans in St. Louis, MO. Phil was responsible for all aspects of the divisionâ€™s operations from business and strategic planning to operationalizing clinical programs, including establishment of revenue/expense projections, staffing guidelines, pricing models, sales/marketing, IT systems, accreditation and outcomes reporting. Prior to his role with ForeSee Health, Phil was Executive Director of Barnes Eyecare Network , an integrated network of over 200 optometrists and ophthalmologists affiliated with the Department of Ophthalmology and Visual Sciences at Washington University School of Medicine. Phil provided leadership and oversight for all network operations including marketing, business development, contracting, payor/provider relations, claims processing, reimbursement systems, utilization management, credentialing and quality improvement.
